import React, {Component} from "react"; export default class FilterContainer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } getFilters = () => { let filters = { gender: this.getCheckedValues("gender"), size: this.getCheckedValues("size"), category: this.getCheckedValues("category"), colour: this.getCheckedValues("colour"), } console.log("Filters: ", filters) let filteredProducts = this.props.products if(filters.gender.length > 0) { for(let i =0; i < filters.gender.length; i++) { filteredProducts = filteredProducts.concat(this.props.products.filter(product => { return product.gender === filters.gender[i] })) } } console.log(filteredProducts) } // Helper function to get the values from a checkbox group and add them // to their respective arrays getCheckedValues = (filterName) => { let checkboxes = document.getElementsByName(filterName) let checkedValues = [] checkboxes.forEach((checkbox) => { if(checkbox.checked) { checkedValues.push(checkbox.value) } }) return checkedValues } render() { return (

Gender

Size

Category

Colour

Price

) } }
